me.donkeycore.minigamemanager.rotations

Class DefaultRotation

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.donkeycore.minigamemanager.rotations.DefaultRotation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Rotation

    public final class DefaultRotation
extends java.lang.Object
implements Rotation
    The default rotation object to be used to represent a rotation where players cycle through minigames
    Author:
    DonkeyCore

    • Field Summary
